channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Look At Beef To Understand Why U.S. Trade Needs A Makeover
item.description: The imbalance within this industry illustrates the broader trade issues that leave the U.S. at a disadvantage.

item.title: FLASHBACK: Mitt Romney mocked in 2012 for self-deportation concept that has now become a reality
item.description: Former Sen. Mitt Romney was mocked in his 2012 presidential run for promoting the idea that illegal immigrants could be encouraged to self-deport.

item.title: Why Is Trump’s DOJ Hiding An FBI Informant’s Deposition On The Oklahoma Bombing?
item.description: An attorney in Utah is working to unearth the truth through his ongoing lawsuit for surveillance footage of the Oklahoma City bombing.

item.title: House Budget Hawks Are Right to Resist the Irresponsible Senate Plan

item.title: Trump's 'big, beautiful' tax agenda scores major victory in House despite GOP rebellion threats
item.description: In a massive victory for the GOP on Thursday, the House passed a bill that will set the stage for a massive conservative policy overhaul.

item.title: Everything You Need To Know About Three Massive Religious Liberty Cases Before SCOTUS
item.description: Each of these cases seeks to return our nation to the original intent of religious liberty in our U.S. Constitution.

item.title: Libraries Take a Hit in the Latest White House Order
